title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7000.17 - Payment of grants and contracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7000.17 - Payment of grants and contracts

State Regulations

All payments from the IOLA fund shall be made by the State

Comptroller upon certification and authorization of the trustees of the
fund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
7000.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
